title: On Leaving an Apocalyptic Splinter Group
description:
Brandon X used to be a member of a church called the “Church of God Preparing for the kingdom of God." The group holds an apocalyptic view of end times prophecy and the end of the world as we know it. Brandon left in 2013.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
